body:
Hello @jbrockmendel! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/arrays/categorical.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/4f0cf906344cabafaec42c19172953e7ed15cb16/pandas/core/arrays/categorical.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/arrays/sparse.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/4f0cf906344cabafaec42c19172953e7ed15cb16/pandas/core/arrays/sparse.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/frame.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/4f0cf906344cabafaec42c19172953e7ed15cb16/pandas/core/frame.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/internals/construction.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/4f0cf906344cabafaec42c19172953e7ed15cb16/pandas/core/internals/construction.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/series.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/4f0cf906344cabafaec42c19172953e7ed15cb16/pandas/core/series.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/sparse/frame.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/4f0cf906344cabafaec42c19172953e7ed15cb16/pandas/core/sparse/frame.py) !
